trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows control to display a list of items.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Windows 控制項以顯示項目清單。

trans-unit.source: The ListBox control enables you to display a list of items to the user that the user can select by clicking.
trans-unit.target: ListBox 控制項可讓您顯示給使用者，使用者可以按一下選取的項目清單。

trans-unit.source: A ListBox control can provide single or multiple selections using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ListBox 控制項可以提供單一或多個選取項目使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ListBox also provides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MultiColumn%2A> property to enable the display of items in columns instead of a straight vertical list of items.
trans-unit.target: 清單方塊也會提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MultiColumn%2A>，啟用項目的資料行，而不是直接垂直清單中的項目顯示的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MultiColumn%2A>

trans-unit.source: With this, the control can display more visible items and the user no longer needs to scroll to an item.
trans-unit.target: 與這個項目，此控制項可以顯示更明顯可見的項目，使用者不再需要捲動項目。

trans-unit.source: Typically, Windows handles the task of drawing the items to display in the ListBox.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，Windows 會處理繪製的項目在清單方塊中顯示的工作。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property, and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MeasureItem> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> events so you can override the automatic drawing that Windows provides and draw the items yourself.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>屬性，並控制代碼<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MeasureItem>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem>事件，因此您可以覆寫繪製 Windows 自動提供，並自行繪製項目。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MeasureItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use owner-drawn ListBox controls to display variable-height items, images, or a different color or font for the text of each item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用主控描繪清單方塊控制項來顯示清單中的變動高度項目、 影像或不同的色彩或每個項目的文字字型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalExtent%2A> property, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemRectangle%2A> also help you draw your own items.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalExtent%2A>屬性， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemHeight%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemRectangle%2A>也可協助您繪製您自己的項目。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalExtent%2A>

trans-unit.source: In addition to display and selection functionality, the ListBox also provides features that enable you to efficiently add items to the ListBox and to find text within the items of the list.
trans-unit.target: 顯示和選取的功能，除了清單方塊也會提供可讓您有效率地將項目加入清單方塊，並找出清單的項目內文字的功能。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate%2A> methods enable you to add a large number of items to the ListBox without the control being repainted each time an item is added to the list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate%2A>方法可讓您將大量的項目加入清單方塊項目新增至清單每次重繪控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A> methods enable you to search for an item in the list that contains a specific search string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A>方法可讓您搜尋包含特定的搜尋字串的清單中的項目。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A> properties provide access to the three collections that are used by the ListBox.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A>屬性會提供三個集合所使用的清單方塊的存取。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table outlines the three collections used by the ListBox and their use within the control.
trans-unit.target: 下表摘要列出三個清單方塊和使用控制項中的所使用的集合。

trans-unit.source: |Collection class|Use within the ListBox| |----------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>|Contains all items contained in the ListBox control.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedObjectCollection>|Contains a collection of the selected items which is a subset of the items contained in the ListBox control.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection>|Contains a collection of the selected indexes, which is a subset of the indexes of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>.
trans-unit.target: |集合類別 |在清單方塊中的使用 | |----------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>|包含 ListBox 控制項中包含的所有項目。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedObjectCollection>|包含集合選取的項目，其中是包含在清單方塊控制項中的項目子集。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection>|包含集合，將選定的索引，其中是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>索引子集</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedObjectCollection></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>

trans-unit.source: These indexes specify items that are selected.| The following three examples show the three indexed collections that the ListBox class supports.
trans-unit.target: 這些索引指定已選取項目。 | 下列三個範例顯示 ListBox 類別支援三個索引的集合。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows an example of how the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> stores the items of the ListBox as well as their selection state within an example ListBox.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示如何的範例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>儲存的清單方塊為其選取狀態，範例清單方塊內的項目。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>

trans-unit.source: |Index|Item|Selection state within the ListBox| |-----------|----------|----------------------------------------| |0|object1|Unselected| |1|object2|Selected| |2|object3|Unselected| |3|object4|Selected| |4|object5|Selected| Based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> shown in the previous table, this table shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedObjectCollection> would appear.
trans-unit.target: |索引 |項目 |在清單方塊中的選取狀態 | |-----------|----------|----------------------------------------| |&0; | object1 |未選取 | |&1; | object2 |選取 | |&2; | object3 |未選取 | |&3; | object4 |選取 | |&4; | object5 |選取 | 根據<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>，如上表所示，此表格顯示如何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedObjectCollection>會出現。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedObjectCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>

trans-unit.source: |Index|Item| |-----------|----------| |0|object2| |1|object4| |2|object5| Based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> shown in the previous table, this table shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection> would appear.
trans-unit.target: |索引 |項目 | |-----------|----------| |&0; | object2 | |&1; | object4 | |&2; | object5 | 根據<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>，如上表所示，此表格顯示如何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection>會出現。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>

trans-unit.source: |Index|Index of item| |-----------|-------------------| |0|1| |1|3| |2|4| The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> class enables you to add items to the ListBox.
trans-unit.target: |索引 |項目的索引 | |-----------|-------------------| |&0; |&1; | |&1; |&3; | |&2; |&4; | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>類別可讓您將項目加入清單方塊。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method can accept any object when adding a member to the ListBox.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>方法可以接受任何物件，將成員加入至清單方塊時。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: When an object is being added to the ListBox, the control uses the text defined in the <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> method of the object unless a member name within the object is specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當物件新增至清單方塊中時，此控制項會使用中定義的文字<xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>物件的方法除非此物件內的成員名稱會指定於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> </xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>

trans-unit.source: In addition to adding items using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> class you can also add items using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 除了新增項目使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>方法的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>類別，您也可以新增項目使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>屬性的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you have a ListBox, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> on a base Windows form and want to modify the string collections of those controls in a derived Windows form, the string collections of those controls in the base Windows form must be empty.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 清單方塊中，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>基底 Windows form 並想来修改這些控制項衍生的 Windows form 中的字串集合，基底的 Windows form 中的這些控制項的字串集合必須是空白。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: If the string collections are not empty, they become read-only when you derive another Windows form.
trans-unit.target: 如果字串集合不是空的它們會變成唯讀時衍生另一個 Windows form。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.target: 物件的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> currently enables selection of list items.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>目前啟用清單項目的選取。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>if <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode"></xref> is not <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the background color of the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> ，代表控制項的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor*> property.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor*>

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: The background image of the form.
trans-unit.target: 表單的背景影像。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BackgroundImage*> property of the label changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BackgroundImage*>屬性標籤變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BackgroundImage*>

trans-unit.target: 這個事件與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image layout for a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> as defined in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定背景影像配置<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>中所定義<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個值的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The values are <xref uid="langword_csharp_Center" name="Center" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Stretch" name="Stretch" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Tile" name="Tile" href=""></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_Zoom" name="Zoom" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The values are <xref uid="langword_csharp_Center" name="Center" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Stretch" name="Stretch" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Tile" name="Tile" href=""></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_Zoom" name="Zoom" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Center" name="Center" href=""></xref> is the default value.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Center" name="Center" href=""></xref>預設值。

trans-unit.target: 指定的列舉值不存在。

trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BackgroundImageLayout*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BackgroundImageLayout*>

trans-unit.target: 這個事件與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Maintains performance while items are added to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> one at a time by preventing the control from drawing until the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate*> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 加入項目時可維護效能<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>藉由防止圖形直到控制項一次一個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate*>方法呼叫。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate*>

trans-unit.source: The preferred way to add multiple items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> class (through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>).
trans-unit.target: 新增多個項目，最好<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>是使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>類別 (透過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to add an array of items to the list in a single operation.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您將項目陣列加入至單一作業中的清單。

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to add items one at a time using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> class, you can use the BeginUpdate method to prevent the control from repainting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> each time an item is added to the list.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您想要加入的項目一於使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>類別，您可以使用 BeginUpdate 方法防止重繪控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>每個項目新增至清單的時間。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: Once you have completed the task of adding items to the list, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate%2A> method to enable the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> to repaint.
trans-unit.target: 完成的工作項目加入清單後，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate%2A>方法，以啟用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>重繪。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: This way of adding items can prevent flickered drawing of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> when a large number of items are being added to the list.
trans-unit.target: 加入項目可以防止這種 flickered 繪圖的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>當正在大量項目加入至清單。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of border that is drawn around the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定繪製周圍的框線類型<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 值不是其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Unselects all items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 中的所有項目會取消選取<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method is equivalent to setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndex%2A> property to negative one (-1).
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法相當於設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndex%2A>為負一 (-1) 的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to quickly unselect all items in the list.
trans-unit.target: 若要快速地取消選取清單中的所有項目，您可以使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>按一下控制項時。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of columns in a multicolumn <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在多重資料行中的資料行的寬度<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If you set the value to zero (0), a default width is assigned to each column.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將值設定為零 (0) 時，預設寬度被指派給每個資料行。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is a multicolumn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, this property returns the current width of each column in the list.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>是多重資料行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，這個屬性傳回的清單中的每個資料行的目前寬度。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to ensure that each column in a multicolumn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> can properly display its items.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性，以確保每個資料行中的多重資料行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>可正確顯示其項目。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of each column in the control.
trans-unit.target: 寬度 （以像素的每個控制項中的資料行）。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: A value less than zero is assigned to the property.
trans-unit.target: 小於零的值指派給屬性。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the item collection.
trans-unit.target: 建立項目集合的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> that represents the new item collection.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>表示新項目集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
trans-unit.target: 建立控制代碼時，取得必要的建立參數。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"></xref> that contains the required creation parameters when the handle to the control is created.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"> </xref>包含必要的建立參數時在建立控制項之控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the width of the tabs between the items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得索引標籤中的項目之間的寬度<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The integer array contains the tab spaces in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 整數陣列 索引標籤中含有空格遞增的順序。

trans-unit.source: A collection of integers representing the tab widths.
trans-unit.target: 表示定位點寬度的整數集合。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the default item height for an owner-drawn <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的預設項目高度描繪<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項的預設大小。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> of the control.
trans-unit.target: 預設值<xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a visual aspect of an owner-drawn <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於主控描繪的視覺外觀<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>變更。

trans-unit.source: This event is used by an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 此事件是由主控描繪<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The event is only raised when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property is set to `DrawMode.OwnerDrawFixed` or `DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`.
trans-unit.target: 此事件，才引發的時機<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>屬性設定為`DrawMode.OwnerDrawFixed`或`DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform the tasks needed to draw items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個事件來執行在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>繪製項目所需的工作

trans-unit.source: If you have a variable-sized item (when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property is set to `DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`), before drawing an item, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MeasureItem> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有可變動大小的項目 (當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>屬性設定為`DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`)，繪製項目之前,<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MeasureItem>就會引發事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MeasureItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MeasureItem> event to specify the size for the item that you are going to draw in your event handler for the DrawItem event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MeasureItem>事件，以指定您所要繪製在 DrawItem 事件的事件處理常式項目的大小。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MeasureItem>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the drawing mode for the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的繪圖模式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode"></xref> values representing the mode for drawing the items of the control.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode"></xref>代表繪製控制項的項目模式的值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_DrawMode.Normal" name="DrawMode.Normal" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_DrawMode.Normal" name="DrawMode.Normal" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is not a member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 指派給屬性的值不是成員的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode"></xref>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: A multicolumn <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> cannot have a variable-sized height.
trans-unit.target: 多重資料行<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>不能有可變大小的高度。

trans-unit.source: Resumes painting the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> control after painting is suspended by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate*> method.
trans-unit.target: 繼續繪製<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>控制暫停繪製之後<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate*>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate*>

trans-unit.source: The preferred way to add items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> class (through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>).
trans-unit.target: 將項目加入，最好<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>是使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>類別 (透過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to add an array of items to the list at one time.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您一次加入清單的項目陣列。

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to add items one at a time using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> class, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate%2A> method to prevent the control from repainting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> each time an item is added to the list.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您想要加入的項目一於使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>類別，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate%2A>方法，以防止重繪控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>每個項目新增至清單的時間。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: Once you have completed the task of adding items to the list, call the EndUpdate method to enable the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> to repaint.
trans-unit.target: 完成的工作項目加入清單後，請呼叫 EndUpdate 方法，以啟用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>重繪。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: This way of adding items can prevent flickered drawing of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> when a large number of items are being added to the list.
trans-unit.target: 加入項目可以防止這種 flickered 繪圖的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>當正在大量項目加入至清單。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: Finds the first item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> that starts with the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 尋找第一個項目中的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>以指定字串開頭。

trans-unit.source: The search performed by this method is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法所執行的搜尋不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The search looks for words that partially match the specified search string parameter, `s`.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋會尋找的文字部分符合指定的搜尋字串參數， `s`。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to search for the first item that matches the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法來搜尋符合指定之字串的第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: You can then perform tasks such as removing the item that contains the search text by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A> method or changing the item's text.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以執行工作，例如移除包含使用的搜尋文字的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A>方法或變更項目的文字。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: Once you have found the specified text, if you want to search for other instances of the text in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, you can use the version of the FindString method that provides a parameter for specifying a starting index within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 一旦找到指定的文字，如果您想要搜尋的文字<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，您可以使用所提供的參數來指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>內的起始索引 FindString 方法的版本</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>中的其他執行個體

trans-unit.source: If you want to perform a search for an exact word match instead of a partial match, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要執行精確的字詞相符而不是在部分符合的搜尋，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的文字。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first item found; returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_ListBox.NoMatches" name="ListBox.NoMatches" href=""></xref> if no match is found.
trans-unit.target: 找到的第一個項目以零為起始的索引傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_ListBox.NoMatches" name="ListBox.NoMatches" href=""></xref>如果找到相符項目。

trans-unit.source: The value of the s parameter is less than -1 or greater than or equal to the item count.
trans-unit.target: 值 s 參數小於-1 或大於或等於項目計數。

trans-unit.source: Finds the first item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> that starts with the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 尋找第一個項目中的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>以指定字串開頭。

trans-unit.source: The search starts at a specific starting index.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋開始於指定的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: The search performed by this method is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法所執行的搜尋不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The search looks for words that partially match the specified search string parameter, `s`.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋會尋找的文字部分符合指定的搜尋字串參數， `s`。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to search for the first item that matches the specified string at the specified starting index within the list of items for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法來搜尋符合指定之字串的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>清單內指定的起始索引位置的第一個項目

trans-unit.source: You can then perform tasks such as removing the item that contains the search text by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A> method or changing the item's text.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以執行工作，例如移除包含使用的搜尋文字的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A>方法或變更項目的文字。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is typically used after a call has been made using the version of this method that does not specify a starting index.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫使用這個方法不會指定起始索引版本之後，通常使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Once an initial item has been found in the list, this method is typically used to find further instances of the search text by specifying the index position in the `startIndex` parameter of the item after the first found instance of the search text.
trans-unit.target: 一旦在清單中找到的初始項目，這個方法通常用來進一步搜尋文字的執行個體指定尋找中的索引位置`startIndex`參數搜尋文字的第一個找到的執行個體後的項目。

trans-unit.source: If you want to perform a search for an exact word match instead of a partial match, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要執行精確的字詞相符而不是在部分符合的搜尋，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the search reaches the bottom of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, it continues searching from the top of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> back to the item specified by the `startIndex` parameter.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 當搜尋到了底部<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，它會繼續從頂端搜尋<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>回所指定的項目`startIndex`參數。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The text to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的文字。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item before the first item to be searched.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的第一個項目之前，項目以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Set to negative one (-1) to search from the beginning of the control.
trans-unit.target: 設定為負一 (-1) 若要搜尋的起點的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first item found; returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_ListBox.NoMatches" name="ListBox.NoMatches" href=""></xref> if no match is found.
trans-unit.target: 找到的第一個項目以零為起始的索引傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_ListBox.NoMatches" name="ListBox.NoMatches" href=""></xref>如果找到相符項目。

trans-unit.source: The startIndex parameter is less than zero or greater than or equal to the value of the property of the class.

trans-unit.target: 找到的第一個項目以零為起始的索引傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_ListBox.NoMatches" name="ListBox.NoMatches" href=""></xref>如果找到相符項目。

trans-unit.source: The startIndex parameter is less than zero or greater than or equal to the value of the property of the class.
trans-unit.target: startIndex 參數小於零或大於或等於值之屬性的類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font of the text displayed by the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項所顯示之文字字型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to apply to the text displayed by the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>来套用至控制項所顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont*> property.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的前景色彩。

trans-unit.source: The foreground <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> of the control.
trans-unit.target: 前景<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultForeColor*> property.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultForeColor*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultForeColor*>

trans-unit.source: Returns the height of an item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回中的項目高度<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property is not set to `DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`, the value of the index parameter is ignored because all items in a standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> are the same size.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>屬性未設定為`DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`，因為在標準的所有項目，則會忽略索引參數的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>大小都一樣。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property when you are using an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> to determine the size of any item within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性，當您使用主控描繪<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>判斷<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>內的任何項目的大小</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item to return the height for.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回其高度的項目以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 高度 （像素為單位指定的項目）。

trans-unit.source: The specified value of the index parameter is less than zero or greater than the item count.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值 index 參數小於零或大於項目計數。

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounding rectangle for an item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的項目之周框<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If the item specified in the `index` parameter is not visible, the rectangle returned by this method will be outside the visible portion of the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果在指定的項目`index`看不到參數，這個方法所傳回的矩形將控制項的可見部分之外。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to determine the size and position of an item within the list.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法來決定的大小和位置的清單內的項目。

trans-unit.source: To get the height of an item, especially a variable-height owner drawn list item, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemHeight%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得的項目高度，特別是可變高度擁有者繪製的清單項目，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemHeight%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of item whose bounding rectangle you want to return.
trans-unit.target: 您想要傳回其周框的項目以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounding rectangle for the specified item.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> ，表示指定的項目之周框。

trans-unit.source: The index parameter is less than zero or greater than or equal to the value of the property of the class.
trans-unit.target: index 參數小於零或大於或等於值之屬性的類別。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the bounds within which the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> is scaled.
trans-unit.target: 擷取的範圍內<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>縮放。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> class overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetScaledBounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to ensure that the requested height is scaled rather than the current height.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>類別覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetScaledBounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法，以確保要求的高度為隨著調整，而不是目前的高度。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetScaledBounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the area for which to retrieve the display bounds.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> ，指定要為其擷取顯示範圍的區域。

trans-unit.source: The height and width of the control's bounds.
trans-unit.target: 高度和寬度的控制項範圍。

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"></xref> that specifies the bounds of the control to use when defining its size and position.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個值的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"> </xref> ，指定要定義的大小和位置時使用的控制項範圍。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> representing the bounds within which the control is scaled.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>表示縮放控制項的範圍。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the specified item is selected.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，表示是否選取指定的項目。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to quickly determine whether a specified item is selected.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法來快速判斷是否選取指定的項目。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful when a specific operation needs to be performed when a specific item in a multiple-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is selected.
trans-unit.target: 需要多個選取項目中的特定項目時所要執行的特定作業時，此方法相當實用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>已選取。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item that determines whether it is selected.
trans-unit.target: 判斷是否已選取的項目以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified item is currently selected in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的項目中目前選取<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The index parameter is less than zero or greater than or equal to the value of the property of the class.
trans-unit.target: index 參數小於零或大於或等於值之屬性的類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width by which the horizontal scroll bar of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> can scroll.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定之寬度的水平捲軸列<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>可以捲動。

trans-unit.source: This property only reports a useful value if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalScrollbar%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性只會報告有用的值如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalScrollbar%2A>屬性設定為`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalScrollbar%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the width of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is smaller than the value of this property, the horizontal scroll bar horizontally scrolls items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 如果寬度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>小於這個屬性的值，水平捲軸以水平方式在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>捲動項目</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: If the width of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is equal to or greater than this value, the horizontal scroll bar is hidden.
trans-unit.target: 如果寬度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>等於或大於此值，在水平捲軸會隱藏。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is not dynamically updated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值不會動態更新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: This property is useful when the items of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> are owner-drawn.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性時，非常有用的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>為主控描繪。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the owner drawn items of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> are 200 pixels wide, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is 60 pixels wide, the HorizontalExtent property would need to be set to 200 in order to scroll the right edge of the items into the visible region of the control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果的主控描繪項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>是 200 像素寬、 但<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>60 像素寬、 HorizontalExtent 屬性必須設為 200，若要捲動控制項的可見區域中的項目右邊緣。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, that the horizontal scroll bar can scroll the control.
trans-unit.target: 寬度 （以像素水平捲軸可以捲動控制項）。

trans-unit.source: The default is zero.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是零。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a horizontal scroll bar is displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出水平捲軸會顯示在控制項中。

trans-unit.source: The HorizontalScrollbar property determines whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> should display a horizontal scroll bar when the width of items within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> extend beyond the right edge of the control.
trans-unit.target: HorizontalScrollbar 屬性會決定是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>應該會顯示水平捲軸列時內的項目寬度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>延伸超過控制項的右邊緣。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the scroll bar is automatically displayed based on the width of items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性設定為`true`，捲軸會自動顯示根據<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>中的項目寬度

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, in order to properly display a horizontal scroll bar, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalExtent%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>會描繪<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，才能正確顯示水平捲軸，您必須設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalExtent%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalExtent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to display a horizontal scroll bar in the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要顯示水平捲軸控制項。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the zero-based index of the item at the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定座標處的項目以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: This method enables you to determine which item is located at a specific location within the control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可讓您判斷哪一個項目位於控制項內特定位置。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to determine which item within the list is selected when a user right-clicks the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法來決定哪一個項目清單中的選取使用者按一下滑鼠右鍵<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>時

trans-unit.source: The location of the cursor can be determined and passed to the `p` parameter of the IndexFromPoint method to determine which item the user right-clicked the mouse over.
trans-unit.target: 游標的位置可以決定，並傳遞至`p`IndexFromPoint 方法，以判斷其項目使用者的參數，以滑鼠右鍵按一下滑鼠上。

trans-unit.source: You can then display a shortcut menu to the user to provide tasks and features based on the specific item.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您就可以顯示快顯功能表給使用者，以便提供工作和特定的項目為基礎的功能。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> object containing the coordinates used to obtain the item index.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref>物件，其中包含用來取得的項目索引的座標。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item found at the specified coordinates; returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_ListBox.NoMatches" name="ListBox.NoMatches" href=""></xref> if no match is found.
trans-unit.target: 找到指定的座標處的項目以零為起始的索引傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_ListBox.NoMatches" name="ListBox.NoMatches" href=""></xref>如果找到相符項目。

trans-unit.source: Returns the zero-based index of the item at the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定座標處的項目以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: This method enables you to determine which item that is located at a specific location within the control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可讓您判斷哪一個是在控制項內的特定位置的項目。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to determine which item within the list is selected when a user right-clicks the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法來決定哪一個項目清單中的選取使用者按一下滑鼠右鍵<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>時

trans-unit.source: The location of the cursor can be determined and passed to the `x` and `y` parameters of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IndexFromPoint%2A> method to determine which item the user right-clicked the mouse over.
trans-unit.target: 游標的位置可以決定，並傳遞至`x`和`y`參數<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IndexFromPoint%2A>方法，以判斷其項目使用者以滑鼠右鍵按一下滑鼠透過。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IndexFromPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then display a shortcut menu to the user to provide tasks and features based on the specific item.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您就可以顯示快顯功能表給使用者，以便提供工作和特定的項目為基礎的功能。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the location to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的位置的 x 座標。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the location to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的位置的 y 座標。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item found at the specified coordinates; returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_ListBox.NoMatches" name="ListBox.NoMatches" href=""></xref> if no match is found.
trans-unit.target: 找到指定的座標處的項目以零為起始的索引傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_ListBox.NoMatches" name="ListBox.NoMatches" href=""></xref>如果找到相符項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control should resize to avoid showing partial items.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出控制項是否應該重新調整大小以避免僅顯示部分項目。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the control automatically resizes to ensure that an item is not partially displayed.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性設定為`true`，控制項會自動調整大小以確保不部分顯示項目。

trans-unit.source: If you want to maintain the original size of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> based on the space requirements of your form, set this property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要維護的原始大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>根據表單的空間需求，將此屬性設定為`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> sizes are such that they show only whole items.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>大小會使其只顯示整個項目。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: If you want the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> to completely fill a docked area, set IntegralHeight to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>完全填滿停駐的區域，設定為 IntegralHeight `false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: This causes the control to completely fill the area, but the last item is not fully displayed.
trans-unit.target: 這會讓控制項完全填滿區域中，但沒有充分顯示最後一個項目。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> does not contain any items, this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>不包含任何項目，這個屬性沒有任何作用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The integral height is based on the height of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, rather than the client area height.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 整數高度為基礎的高度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，而不是工作區高度。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: As a result, when the IntegralHeight property is set `true`, items can still be partially shown if scroll bars are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，當 IntegralHeight 屬性設定`true`，項目仍可以部分顯示才顯示捲軸。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property is set to `DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`, this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>屬性設定為`DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`，此屬性沒有任何作用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control resizes so that it does not display partial items; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>控制項會調整大小，它不會顯示部分項目。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of an item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定中的項目高度<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property is set to `DrawMode.OwnerDrawFixed`, all items have the same height.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>屬性設定為`DrawMode.OwnerDrawFixed`，所有項目具有相同的高度。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property is set to `DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`, the ItemHeight property specifies the height of each item added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>屬性設定為`DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`，ItemHeight 屬性指定的每個項目加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>高度</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because each item in an owner-drawn list can have a different height, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemHeight%2A> method to get the height of a specific item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 由於在主控描繪清單中的每個項目可以有不同的高度，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemHeight%2A>方法來取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>中特定項目的高度</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you use the ItemHeight property on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> with items of variable height, this property returns the height of the first item in the control.

trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性設定為`true`，會顯示項目文字由右至左，而不是預設從左到右的方法。

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否永遠顯示垂直捲軸。

trans-unit.source: The ScrollAlwaysVisible property indicates whether a vertical scroll bar is always displayed, even if the number of items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> does not require displaying the vertical scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: ScrollAlwaysVisible 屬性會指出是否永遠顯示垂直捲軸，即使<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>不需要顯示垂直捲軸列</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>中的項目數

trans-unit.source: By default, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> only shows a vertical scroll bar when there are enough items to warrant displaying.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>只會有足夠的項目，來保證作業顯示時顯示垂直捲軸。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: For a multicolumn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, the ScrollAlwaysVisible property indicates that a horizontal scroll bar is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 多重資料行的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，ScrollAlwaysVisible 屬性指出水平捲軸會顯示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: A vertical scroll bar is never displayed regardless of the value of this property for a multicolumn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 垂直捲軸永遠不會顯示這個屬性的值為何的多重資料行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the vertical scroll bar should always be displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果應該永遠顯示垂直捲軸;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the zero-based index of the currently selected item in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在目前選取之項目的以零為起始的索引<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For a standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, you can use this property to determine the index of the item that is selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 標準<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，您可以使用這個屬性來判斷在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>已選取的項目的索引</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is set to either `SelectionMode.MultiSimple` or `SelectionMode.MultiExtended` (which indicates a multiple-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>) and multiple items are selected in the list, this property can return the index to any selected item.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>會設為`SelectionMode.MultiSimple`或`SelectionMode.MultiExtended`(表示多重選擇<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>) 並在清單中選取多個項目，這個屬性可以傳回任何選取的項目索引。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve a collection containing the indexes of all selected items in a multiple-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取集合，其中包含的所有索引選取的項目在多重選擇<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: If you want to obtain the item that is currently selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItem%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要取得中目前選取的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItem%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A> property to obtain all the selected items in a multiple-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 此外，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A>屬性來取得多重選擇<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>所有選取的項目</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index of the currently selected item.
trans-unit.target: 目前選取的項目以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: A value of negative one (-1) is returned if no item is selected.
trans-unit.target: 負一 (-1) 如果會傳回任何項目已選取。

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is less than -1 or greater than or equal to the item count.
trans-unit.target: 指派的值小於-1 或大於或等於項目計數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode*>屬性設定為<xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndex*> property or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices*> collection has changed.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<> *> 屬性或<> *> 集合已變更。

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for this event to determine when the selected index in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> has been changed.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立此事件，以判斷何時的事件處理常式中選取的索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>已變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: This can be useful when you need to display information in other controls based on the current selection in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 這有助於進行您需要根據目前的選取範圍，在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>其他控制項中顯示資訊

trans-unit.source: You can use the event handler for this event to load the information in the other controls.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用此事件的事件處理常式載入其他控制項中的資訊。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName>, any change to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A> collection, including removing an item from the selection, will raise this event.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName>，對任何變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A>集合，包括項目移除選取範圍，會引發這個事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that contains the zero-based indexes of all currently selected items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合，其中包含以零為起始的索引中的所有目前選取項目的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For a multiple-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, this property returns a collection containing the indexes to all items that are selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 多個選取項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，這個屬性會傳回集合，其中包含所有的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>中選取的項目索引</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: For a single-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, this property returns a collection containing a single element containing the index of the only selected item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 單一選取項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，這個屬性會傳回集合，其中包含單一項目包含在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>只有選取的項目索引</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to manipulate the items of the collection, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何管理集合的項目，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> class provides a number of ways to reference selected items.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>類別提供數種方式來參考選取的項目。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the SelectedIndices property to obtain the index position of the currently selected item in a single-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用 SelectedIndices 屬性來取得目前選取之項目的索引位置，在單一選取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndex%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: If you want to obtain the item that is currently selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, instead of the index position of the item, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItem%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要取得中目前選取的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，而不是項目的索引位置，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItem%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A> property if you want to obtain all the selected items in a multiple-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 此外，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A>屬性，如果您想要取得多重選擇<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>所有選取的項目</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection> containing the indexes of the currently selected items in the control.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection>包含控制項中目前選取的項目索引。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection>

trans-unit.target: 如果目前不選取任何項目，空<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection>傳回。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection>

trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>會設為`SelectionMode.MultiSimple`或`SelectionMode.MultiExtended`(表示多重選擇<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>) 並在清單中選取多個項目，這個屬性可以傳回任何選取的項目。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve a collection containing all selected items in a multiple-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A> property.

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A> property to obtain all the selected indexes in a multiple-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 此外，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A>屬性來取得所有選取的索引，在多重選擇<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A>

trans-unit.target: 表示控制項中的目前選取範圍的物件。

trans-unit.target: 取得集合，包含在目前選取的項目<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> class provides a number of ways to reference selected items.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>類別提供數種方式來參考選取的項目。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the SelectedItems property to obtain the currently selected item in a single-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItem%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用 SelectedItems 屬性來取得目前選取的項目在單一選取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItem%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: If you want to obtain the index position of an item that is currently selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, instead of the item itself, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要取得的項目中目前選取的索引位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，而非本身的項目，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndex%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.target: 此外，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A>屬性，如果您想要取得所有選取的項目在多重選擇<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>中的索引位置</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the method in which items are selected in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的方法中選取項目<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The SelectionMode property enables you to determine how many items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> a user can select at one time and how the user can make multiple-selections.
trans-unit.target: SelectionMode 屬性可讓您判斷在項目數目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>使用者可以選取一次，以及使用者如何進行多重選取。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: When the SelectionMode property is set to `SelectionMode.MultiExtended`, pressing SHIFT and clicking the mouse or pressing SHIFT and one of the arrow keys (UP ARROW, DOWN ARROW, LEFT ARROW, and RIGHT ARROW) extends the selection from the previously selected item to the current item.
trans-unit.target: 當 selectionmode 設定為`SelectionMode.MultiExtended`、 按住 shift 鍵並按一下滑鼠按鈕或按 SHIFT 和方向鍵 （向上、 向下鍵、 向左鍵和向右箭號） 的其中一個延伸選取範圍從先前選取的項目到目前的項目。

trans-unit.source: Pressing CTRL and clicking the mouse selects or deselects an item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 按住 CTRL 並按一下滑鼠選取，或取消選取清單中的項目。

trans-unit.source: When the property is set to `SelectionMode.MultiSimple`, a mouse click or pressing the SPACEBAR selects or deselects an item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 當屬性設定為`SelectionMode.MultiSimple`、 按一下滑鼠或按下空格鍵選取或取消選取清單中的項目。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_SelectionMode.One" name="SelectionMode.One" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_SelectionMode.One" name="SelectionMode.One" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 指派的值不是其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified bounds of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 設定指定的界限<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The height of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control increases and decreases by a multiple of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ItemHeight%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 高度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制項增加和減少的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ItemHeight%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ItemHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: If height is a number that is not a multiple of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ItemHeight%2A>, the height of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> will change by the largest multiple that is less than height.
trans-unit.target: 高度是否不是倍數的數字<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ItemHeight%2A>，高度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>會變更的最大的多個，小於高度。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ItemHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the parameters that correspond to the bounds not included in the specified parameter are passed in with their current values.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，對應到不包含在指定的參數繫結的參數傳入其目前值。

trans-unit.source: For example, the `height`, `width`, or the `x` or `y` properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> property can be passed in with a reference to the current instance of the control.
trans-unit.target: 例如， `height`， `width`，或`x`或`y`屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>屬性可以傳入控制項的目前執行個體的參考。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, all values passed in are honored and applied to the control.
trans-unit.target: 不過，會接受所有傳入的值，而套用至控制項。

trans-unit.source: The `specified` parameter represents the elements of the controls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bounds%2A> changed by your application.
trans-unit.target: `specified`參數代表控制項的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bounds%2A>變更您的應用程式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> of the control, the `specified` parameter value is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified>.

trans-unit.source: However, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> is adjusted in response to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> property being set, the `specified` parameter value is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified>.

trans-unit.source: Sorts the items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 中的項目排序<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Sort forces the collection to add each item back to itself if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Sorted%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 排序會強制每個項目新增至本身，如果集合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Sorted%2A>屬性是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Sorted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each item is then inserted into the correct position.
trans-unit.target: 每個項目會插入正確的位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> are sorted alphabetically.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否在項目<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>依字母順序排序。

trans-unit.source: Use the Sorted property to automatically sort strings alphabetically in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 使用屬性來自動排序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>依字母順序中的字串

trans-unit.source: As items are added to a sorted <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, the items are moved to the appropriate location in the sorted list.
trans-unit.target: 當項目新增至排序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，項目會移至已排序的清單中的適當位置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: When adding items to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, it is more efficient to sort the items first and then add new items.
trans-unit.target: 當加入項目至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，它會先排序的項目，然後再加入新項目更有效率。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> with its Sorted set to `true` should not be bound to data using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>設為其排序與`true`不會繫結至資料使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: To display sorted data in a bound <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, you should bind to a data source that supports sorting and have the data source provide the sorting.
trans-unit.target: 顯示已排序資料中繫結至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，您應該將繫結至支援排序的資料來源，並有提供排序的資料來源。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if items in the control are sorted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控制項中的項目分組。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or searches for the text of the currently selected item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或搜尋在目前選取之項目的文字<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When the value of this property is set to a string value, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> searches for the item within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> that matches the specified text and selects the item.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性的值設定為字串值，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>搜尋中的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，符合指定的文字和選取的項目。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to determine which items are currently selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用這個屬性來判斷<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>中目前所選取的項目

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is set to `SelectionMode.MultiExtended`, this property returns the text of the first selected item.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>設`SelectionMode.MultiExtended`，這個屬性會傳回第一個選取之項目的文字。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is not set to `SelectionMode.None`, this property returns the text of the first selected item.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>未設定為`SelectionMode.None`，這個屬性會傳回第一個選取之項目的文字。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>
